inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getInfrastructureConfiguration.

resourceTags.description: Key-value map of resource tags for the infrastructure created by the infrastructure configuration.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags for the infrastructure configuration.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getInfrastructureConfiguration.

dateCreated.description: Date the infrastructure configuration was updated.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

instanceMetadataOptions.description: Nested list of instance metadata options for the HTTP requests that pipeline builds use to launch EC2 build and test instances.

instanceProfileName.description: Name of the IAM Instance Profile associated with the configuration.

instanceTypes.description: Set of EC2 Instance Types associated with the configuration.

keyPair.description: Name of the EC2 Key Pair associated with the configuration.

resourceTags.description: Key-value map of resource tags for the infrastructure created by the infrastructure configuration.

securityGroupIds.description: Set of EC2 Security Group identifiers associated with the configuration.

snsTopicArn.description: ARN of the SNS Topic associated with the configuration.

subnetId.description: Identifier of the EC2 Subnet associated with the configuration.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags for the infrastructure configuration.

terminateInstanceOnFailure.description: Whether instances are terminated on failure.
